text: The 1965–66 North Carolina Tar Heels men's basketball team represented the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill during the 1965–66 men's college basketball season. This was the first season that North Carolina played its home games at Carmichael Auditorium. ==Schedule== 2014-15 North Carolina Tar Heels men's basketball record book . Retrieved 2015-Jun-04. ==References== Category:North Carolina Tar Heels men's basketball seasons Category:1965–66 Atlantic Coast Conference men's basketball season Tar Tar
title: 1965–66 North Carolina Tar Heels men's basketball team
